# Stable (Building)
## Overview
**Stable**

**Create** 42 Goods, 3 Influence, 39 Labor (1,710 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Animal Pen (Room)|Animal Pen]], 1 [[Farmland (Room)|Farmland]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 2 [[Stall (Room)|Stalls]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A structure for housing or selling horses and other mounts.
